name: Drop Boy
description:
This fast paced arcade game is the result of 5 years of procrastination. I hope you love it as much as I loved thinking about making it.

I guarantee that it is hard, fun, challenging and addicting. It has super blocky pixel graphics. What more could you ask for?

13 unique blocks, 4 levels, 1 Drop Boy. Good luck.

This game was made by Daniel Simu, aka Hapiel

The epic original soundtrack was made by VECTRAX

Players have said:

"A masterpiece! Better than Cyberpunk 2077!" - Squirrelsquid
"A fun little labour of love, many years in the making" - Christoballs
"swag" - Gabs
"Hecking groovy" - Binderbear
"I'm trash but this game is not" Also Binderbear
"I can't tell my left from my right" - Christoballs again
"Roofs hurt" - Binderbear once more. We need more players, give me your best quote in the comments!

If you wish drop a donation: Your contribution will go towards bringing out the game for free (no ads) on android and iOS, the game already works (video proof) but I need money for a GameMaker license & app store fees. Thank you!
